s1.subtitle: Pure JORAM/JMS support
s1.p: Support on pure JORAM/JMS issues is provided by the joram@ow2.org forum.
Many questions are already answered in the archives.
For keeping an eye on the forum, please subscribe.
s1.subtitle: Follows all modifications in JORAM SVN
s1.p: For keeping an eye on the JORAM's SVN code base, please subscribe.
s1.subtitle: Support for using JORAM within the JOnAS application server
s1.p: For questions or feedbacks related to using JMS within JOnAS components, or to the JORAM/JOnAS integration, or to specific JORAM/JOnAS architecturing issues, please use the jonas@ow2.org forum.
